metadata.synopsis: The player has been spotted by one of the statues that control the traps at the Shar Temple's main junction. The player is trapped in a room and has an item taken from them as 'punishment'. Note that this trap is more of a training challenge for Shar recruits than it is a security system.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get spottedby the statues that trigger the traps at the main junction

0.speaker: GROUP_SHA_VoiceOfShar
0.text: Shar's warriors must not be caught, must not be tricked. Only loss awaits the unworthy.

1.speaker: GROUP_SHA_VoiceOfShar
1.text: Shar will not embrace those who blunder. The darkness will feed on the weak, taking what they hold dear.
